title: In Due Time...
description: Just when things seemed to be settling down for Carrie King, it spiraled out of control. At almost 30 years old, Carrie had almost everything she could ever want, including a thriving career as a VP of a well-known corporation. Love was the last thing on her mind until Aaron's Waters showed up from New York.Although Aaron would only be in town for a few months for a special project, Carrie couldn't deny the chemistry between them. She also knew it wasn't a good idea to fall for a colleague, especially when her ex, Spencer, just started reaching out to her. Unsure of where her feelings lie Carrie is more confused now then ever, but what she didn't realize that this was just the beginning of a twisted romance.
author: Michaela Washington
